content.fr:
Nous aurons le plaisir de recevoir François Briatte qui animera notre séminaire de recherche le mardi 6 décembre de 14h à 16h. Rendez-vous au 13 rue de l'université, 75007 Paris, dans la salle du médialab en sous-sol. Résumé :

This talk will discuss the network patterns of legislative collaboration that can be observed at the level of bill cosponsorship in several European parliaments. At the theoretical level, those interactions offer a unique perspective on partisan segmentation, ideological polarization, and their compound effects on legislative work. At the methodological level, the talk will discuss some of the challenges related to online data collection, network construction, and network modelling.

title.fr: Séminaire de recherche - 06/12/2016 - 14h à 16h - François Briatte - Network patterns of legislative collaboration
